title: Skin request: Original Junglist Udyr!
body:
This needs to happen.  Please.

I've been looking up guides and found nothing but jungle guides for Udyr. He is the ultimate junglist. So...

Skin to resemble someone like Congo Natty.

Who, let's be honest, already resembles Udyr a little:

http://928e36087f9ccaee74bf-e957e515ffbc0410e732f9ef7d5a3b8f.r59.cf1.rackcdn.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/10/Congo-640x426.jpg

This would make me the happiest LOL player in the known universe. I would pay good money. :D

replies.body:
I agree

I think {{champion:77}} should get that skin
Would be best just to give udyr a " gentleman udyr " skin

Haha Venetian Snares is mental! Despite heavy (and insane) use of the "Amen" break I wouldn't call it jungle tho. More experimental/drumfunk, maybe. Jungle usually has some sort of a connection to reggae/dancehall... This is how it's done:

 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ngFmrOTCCnw
